thread.title: Tom Brady places surprises in Halloween candy buckets
thread.title_full: Tom Brady places surprises in Halloween candy buckets

title: Tom Brady places surprises in Halloween candy buckets
text:
Posted: 8:46 a.m. Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015 Tom Brady places surprises in Halloween candy buckets Sponsored Links MyFoxBoston 
You could find a surprise from Tom Brady in an UnReal 3-D Halloween bucket, if you're lucky. 
Brady left a little something in 50 UnReal Halloween buckets, which have been spread across Whole Foods Market stores in Massachusetts, Maine, Rhode Island, New Hampshire and in the greater Hartford, Connecticut area. 
>> Read more trending stories 
Brady recently come out in favor of natural, healthy food and UnReal is a natural candy company based in Boston. In honor of Halloween, UnReal is selling its candy in variety bags in Whole Foods Markets. 
UnReal didn't give any hints about what the surprises could be, but in a video posted to Brady's Facebook page, there might be a hint: He signs an UnReal card and places it in the bucket.
